title: Homepage hero text tweaks, remove Courses CTAs/links, and show+moderate submitted reviews (non-email changes)

requirements.text: Update the Home page hero heading so that only the word “ACADEMY” in “HR ACADEMY” renders in red, while “HR” remains in the existing white styling.

quotes: for the "ACADEMY" in "HR ACADEMY" above the trusted by parents line, change the colour of letters to red

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page hero, the title reads “HR ACADEMY” with “ACADEMY” in the existing red theme color and “HR” not red
No other hero text color changes are introduced

requirements.text: Remove all public UI options labeled “Explore Courses” and “Our Courses” from the site (including the Home page hero CTA button and the Footer Quick Links entry).

quotes: remove the "Our Courses" and "Explore courses" options entirely

acceptanceCriteria: The Home page hero no longer renders a button labeled “Explore Courses”
The Footer “Quick Links” section no longer includes a link labeled “Our Courses”

requirements.text: Remove the “Courses” navigation item from the Header navigation (desktop and mobile) so visitors do not see a Courses option in the header.

quotes: remove the "Our Courses" and "Explore courses" options entirely

acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation does not display a “Courses” link on desktop
Header navigation does not display a “Courses” link in the mobile menu

requirements.text: In the Footer, remove the standalone “ACADEMY” text displayed near the logo (above/near the Quick Links area) while keeping the logo image.

quotes: above quick links near the logo remove the "ACADEMY"

acceptanceCriteria: Footer shows the brand logo image but does not show the “ACADEMY” text near it
Header logo remains unchanged unless explicitly required by other requirements

requirements.text: Make newly submitted text reviews display publicly on the Home page after submission (without requiring an admin login), and ensure the list updates immediately after a successful submit.

quotes: when someone enters a review make it show on the page

acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes a visible section that lists submitted reviews (name or “Anonymous”, rating, and content)
After submitting a review via the Home page form, the new review appears in the public list without a page refresh

requirements.text: Add an admin-only backend API to delete any submitted text review by ID, and add corresponding admin UI controls in the Admin Reviews tab to delete submitted reviews.

quotes: let the admin delete any if they like

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes an admin-gated method to delete a submitted review by id (and rejects non-admin callers)
Admin Reviews tab shows a delete control for each submitted review entry
After deletion, the review no longer appears in the Admin submitted-reviews list
After deletion, the review no longer appears in the public Home page submitted-reviews list

constraints: Do not implement or claim email forwarding of Contact/Query submissions; email sending is not available in this environment.
nonGoals: Forwarding Contact/Query form submissions to hracademy2305@gmail.com via email
Redesigning the Courses page or deleting the Courses route itself (only remove the specified UI entry points/links)
